intro: Boottia exserta, commonly known as the slender sandwort, is a flowering plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of southern Africa. It is a small, herbaceous annual that typically grows to a height of 10–30 centimeters. The plant produces clusters of small, white or pale pink flowers that bloom in late spring to early summer. Its leaves are narrow and linear, adapted to reduce water loss in dry environments. Boottia exserta is often found in sandy soils and is well-suited to regions with low rainfall.
